item.title: Sacred: Last Pixel of Ancaria announced
item.content:encoded:
Publisher THQ Nordic and developer SparklingBit have announced Sacred: Last Pixel of Ancaria, a 16-bit RPG in the Sacred series. A Kickstarter campaign will launch on April 14, 2026.

Here are the first details, via the game’s Kickstarter page:

About

Pixels, passion, and profanity. A new take on the beloved game.

Key Features

  • Gather Around – Full of troubles and charm. Pixel chaos, dungeons, loot, laughs, and familiar faces.
  • Old Heroes, Fresh Headaches – Build a party of four. Each one thinks they’re in charge. They’re wrong.
  • Places You Almost Remember – Return to your favorite Ancaria landmarks: Seraphim Monastery, Shaddar’s Tower, and yes, you will still feel the Smell of Porto Vallum in the Morning.
  • Tons of Humor – Good jokes, bad jokes, nostalgic winks, and dirty laughs around every corner.
